1.1.1.2.1. shapepipe.modules.combine_mexp_runner module¶

COMBINE_MEXP_RUNNER

This module runs combine_mexp_runner: Combine information on objects and PSF from multiple exposure-single-CCD catalogues.

Author

Martin Kilbinger <martin.kilbinger@cea.fr>

Date

February 2019
